title: One Mid South Not Enough? Why Not Make it a Double
content:
Nearly 200 people are doing the 50k run + 100 mile ride combo at the Oklahoma gravel race this year, including pro cyclists Maude Farrell and Amity Rockwell. Here's why.

Read the full article at One Mid South Not Enough? Why Not Make it a Double on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
